title: New: MYTHHS – Lost
content:
Reading’s MYTHHS show a bolder, more confident edge on their second track, Lost.

Again utilising the rather splendid vocals of lead singer Martha Roper, Lost is a tumultuous number, yet with enough of a ‘pop’ vibe to it to inevitably find them turning industry heads. Check it below and their debut track, Elements here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
